Messages.Author: Jens Wickert
Messages.Content: Dear students, attached please find the schedule für examinations. Please make sure, that you register via MOSES, this should be possible. Greetings Jens Wickert

Messages.Author: Jens Wickert
Messages.Content: Dear students, for the examinations I suggest the second week after the lesson  period at TU Berlin (Wednesday-Thursday) . This is July 31 - August 1. There would be also some slots Aug 6 and 7. For overview and better planning, please let me know, if you want to do the examination, which dates you prefer. Simply send some e-mail. Please note that you need to be registered for the examination. Greetings Jens Wickert

Messages.Author: Jens Wickert
Messages.Content: Dear students, I'm happy that we do have quite many interested students. But I'm currently at Vienna for a large conference, i can report next week on this. So we start with our GNSS remote sensing lessons next week, April 24 at 10:00! see you then, this week will be no lesson. All the best and greetings Jens Wickert
